How it works
Every pie is handmade with love, crafted with care, and baked using only high-quality Swiss ingredients. Each pie is about 24 cm in diameter and serves 6â€“10 people â€” depending, of course, on how generous the slices are.
Orders can be picked up in Wallisellen, or delivery within the ZÃ¼rich area may be arranged. Because every pie and dessert is made from scratch â€” from resting the dough to letting the filling set â€” please allow at least 3 daysâ€™ notice for your order.

text:
Homemade, Pickup & Delivery
Flaky is a cozy home-based microbakery in the ZÃ¼rich area making American-style pies and treatsâ€”from buttery, flaky crusts to chewy and sweet rice krispie treats. Everything is handmade with high-quality Swiss ingredients. Order online for pickup in Wallisellen or delivery across ZÃ¼rich. Seasonal favorites include pumpkin, pecan, apple & key lime.
